§ 4701. Definitions In this subchapter:(1) Environmental lawThe term “environmental law” has the meaning given the term in article 24.1 of the USMCA.
(2) Environmental obligationsThe term “environmental obligations” means obligations relating to the environment under—(A) chapter 1 of the USMCA (relating to initial provisions and general definitions); and
(B) chapter 24 of the USMCA (relating to environment).
(Pub. L. 116–113, title VIII, § 801, Jan. 29, 2020, 134 Stat. 90.)
Editorial Notes
